content: precision of LLMs in generating accurate and actionable outputs. This tool simplifies the process of aligning model behavior with unique business objectives. With these comprehensive training tools, watsonx.ai empowers users to harness the full potential of their models, whether refining traditional ML algorithms or unleashing the power of cutting-edge LLMs. 4.7 Deploying AI models in watsonx.ai This section explores the process of deploying AI models in the watsonx.ai platform. It provides a detailed overview of two major deployment options: Studio and Prompt Lab. From deploying models as APIs for real-time inference to batch processing workflows, the watsonx.ai platform helps ensure flexibility and scalability. Readers gain insights into selecting the most appropriate deployment strategy for their use case while also learning best practices to optimize performance and reliability in production environments. 4.7.1 watsonx.ai Studio deployments Deploying models in watsonx.ai Studio
